ul.li: Remove freezing actions from applet mode. It is a Genepix Bug. Actualy, Axon doesn't support embeded java applets in Genepix.
Graphics in Doelan are not antialiased. Due to a bug in Sun Java Virtual Machine, antialiasing isn't turn on. If you enable it, a fatal error sometimes occurs.

section.name: Submit a Doelan bug
section.p: You can submit a bug by sending a sending a mail to the doelan list.
